promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic special bird psychic-type pokemon with a purple cosmic beak. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or bird. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Galarion, a a gigantic special bird psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Psychic Corkscrew. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bird", "psychic" or "Galarion". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, bird-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: Crypt-dwelling Galarion soars through the air, using its Psychic Corkscrew to excavate secrets and unravel enigmas in its eerie habitat.
